1 . teeming  &ndash; swarming, packed, crowded.

	 

	2 . pull  &ndash; attraction,  appeal, draw, magnetism.

	 

	3 . burgeoning &ndash; growing, mushrooming, rapidly increasing, budding, up-and-coming , promising.

	 

	
		4 . discrepancy  &ndash; inconsistency, difference, incongruity, divergence, disparity, inconsistency.
	
		 
	
		5 . fend off &ndash; ward,  repel,  deflect.
